defaults.__comment: You can disable defaults by setting these to false. Do *NOT* try to add additional entries here. You can add additional entries in the custom section.

custom.__comment: You can define additional blocks to be hammered by Compressed Hammers here. Use * as a wildcard for metadata. Use prefix ore: in name to query the Ore Dictionary.

example.__comment: This example would allow Obsidian to be hammered into nine diamonds using a Compressed Hammer.
example.name: minecraft:obsidian

rewards.__comment: Chance is a floating point value (1.0 equals 100%). Luck is the multiplier that scales the hammers fortune level, applied to the base chance.
rewards.name: minecraft:diamond
